name: Duck of War
description:
Story:

A Boy Duck and a Girl Duck were on a date close to the sea side of the beach but, the date was interrupted by a Mafia Duck who shoots the Girl Duck and ultimately kills her, Boy Duck was filled with shock and rage he then pulls out a shotgun and kills the Mafia Duck, Boy Duck (Real name Duck of War) vows to take revenge against the mafia that killed his beloved Girl Duck.

Play a game so hard you'll break your PC!, get all 10 achievements and help Duck of War to get his REVENGE!

||

Controls:

Keyboard:

A: Moving Left

D: Moving Right

W: Looking Up

Space Bar: Jump

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

|

P/esc: Pause

Controller (Xbox):

Left D Pad: Moving Left

Right D Pad: Moving Right

Up D Pad: Looking Up

A: Jump

B: Shoot

Start Button: Pause
